attributes.name: rowspan
attributes.desc: the number of rows a cell should span(2.8.1)

attributes.name: width
attributes.desc: column width, the width of the same column in different rows is set by the max value (If no border, width contains label and content)

attributes.name: min-width
attributes.desc: column minimum width, columns with width has a fixed width, while columns with min-width has a width that is distributed in proportion (If noborder, width contains label and content)

attributes.name: label-width
attributes.desc: column label width, if not set, it will be the same as the width of the column. Higher priority than the label-width of Descriptions(2.8.8)

attributes.name: align
attributes.desc: column content alignment (If no border, effective for both label and content)

attributes.name: label-align
attributes.desc: column label alignment, if omitted, the value of the above align attribute will be applied (If no border, please use align attribute)
